Title.evidence: Tibial Bone Remodeling with Total Knee Arthroplasty: A Randomised Controlled Trial

Intervention.evidence: 54 participants were randomised to receive either rotating-platform (n=28) or fixed-platform (n=26) cemented TKA.

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to compare tibial bone density changes in cemented TKA components with different bearing designs.

Method_Outcome.evidence: CT scans were performed postoperatively and at 1 and 2 years.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation was achieved using [randomisation method] with allocation concealment via [allocation concealment method].

Number_Randomised.evidence: 54 participants were randomised to receive either rotating-platform (n=28) or fixed-platform (n=26) cemented TKA.
